Key Match Events: The match was abandoned due to a wet outfield
Pre-Game Insights: India had already qualified for the Super-8 stage with 7 points, while Canada finished with three points from four matches, having previously defeated Ireland
Post-Match Reflections: Both teams were awarded a point each for the abandoned match
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game, even if it would've gone ahead, wasn't going to affect the next round as India and USA had already confirmed qualification for Super-8
